price: 68. Kuwa u xiga Ibraahiim dadka waa kuwaa raacay, iyo Nabigaan (Nabi Muxammad) iyo kuwa rumeeyey (Muslimiinta). Allena waa Gargaaraha mu’miniinta.
arabic: إِنَّ أَوۡلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لَلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ وَهَٰذَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna awlā al-nāsi bi-ib'rāhīma lalladhīna ittabaʿūhu wahādhā al-nabiyu wa-alladhīna āmanū wal-lahu waliyyu al-mu'minīna
